translation: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: Proceed to the next mission?{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: みんなで話すデモ{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: みんなで話すデモ{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: Now, you two. Can I have a moment?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Now, you two. Can I have a moment?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yes.{#Name="Decadus/Octa"}
source: Yes.{#Name="Decadus/Octa"}

translation: Good. Because you both need to hear this.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Good. Because you both need to hear this.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Yes?{#Name="Decadus/Octa"}
source: ...Yes?{#Name="Decadus/Octa"}

translation: I'm not going to mince words here.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm not going to mince words here.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's about our...nighttime activities.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's about our...nighttime activities.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Your performance has been abysmal.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Your performance has been abysmal.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Preposterous!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Preposterous!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: My gargantuan joy-stick is the talk of the town in taverns the world—{#Name="Octa"}
source: My gargantuan joy-stick is the talk of the town in taverns the world—{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Size doesn't equate to "joy" in this case.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Size doesn't equate to "joy" in this case.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Huh?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Look. It's not about how many times you continue...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Look. It's not about how many times you continue...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's about making the most of your play session.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's about making the most of your play session.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Just being "gargantuan" is worthless.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Just being "gargantuan" is worthless.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So either level up your skills, or we're done. Got it?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So either level up your skills, or we're done. Got it?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Y-Yes, my lady! Terribly sorry, my lady!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Y-Yes, my lady! Terribly sorry, my lady!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: As for you, Decadus. Frankly, you've always been{LF}a perfect gentleman to me.{#Name="Zero"}
source: As for you, Decadus. Frankly, you've always been{LF}a perfect gentleman to me.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I seek only to serve you in all things, my lady.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I seek only to serve you in all things, my lady.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: But your...preferences are a bit...extreme.{#Name="Zero"}
source: But your...preferences are a bit...extreme.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: We can't go five minutes without you begging me{LF}to punish you somehow.{#Name="Zero"}
source: We can't go five minutes without you begging me{LF}to punish you somehow.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Uuunnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Uuunnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: That kind of stuff is fine on occasion, but if we{LF}do it every single time, it loses its impact.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That kind of stuff is fine on occasion, but if we{LF}do it every single time, it loses its impact.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: A thousand apologies, my lady.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: A thousand apologies, my lady.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Great, then. I'm glad we had this talk.{LF}Class dismissed.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Great, then. I'm glad we had this talk.{LF}Class dismissed.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yes, my lady!{#Name="Decadus/Octa"}
source: Yes, my lady!{#Name="Decadus/Octa"}

translation: By the way, Octa. Do you ever consider just...{LF}you know. Satisfying yourself?{#Name="Zero"}
source: By the way, Octa. Do you ever consider just...{LF}you know. Satisfying yourself?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho! And why would I do that when I have{LF}the whole world as my lover?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! And why would I do that when I have{LF}the whole world as my lover?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: The whole... Wait, what?{#Name="Zero"}
source: The whole... Wait, what?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, an Intoner is best, of course.{LF}But if one's not available, a human will suffice.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Well, an Intoner is best, of course.{LF}But if one's not available, a human will suffice.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: If neither of those are available, ****** will do. ***** are all right,{LF}too—in fact, I've been really enjoying ******* lately!{#Name="Octa"}
source: If neither of those are available, ****** will do. ***** are all right,{LF}too—in fact, I've been really enjoying ******* lately!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: That's just wonderful.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That's just wonderful.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You know, what I'd really like to try sometime? A ******!{#Name="Octa"}
source: You know, what I'd really like to try sometime? A ******!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Do you guys ever sleep? I always hear the three of you{LF}yelling and making weird noises at night...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Do you guys ever sleep? I always hear the three of you{LF}yelling and making weird noises at night...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: We're just playing around before we go to bed.{#Name="Zero"}
source: We're just playing around before we go to bed.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You're playing? Aw, no fair! I wanna play too!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: You're playing? Aw, no fair! I wanna play too!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Um...yeah, no. That's not going to work.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Um...yeah, no. That's not going to work.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Can I play when I grow up? Huh? Pleeease!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Can I play when I grow up? Huh? Pleeease!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: We'll talk about it later.{#Name="Zero"}
source: We'll talk about it later.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Boy, I sure hope I grow up soon.{LF}I can't wait to play with you guys all night!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Boy, I sure hope I grow up soon.{LF}I can't wait to play with you guys all night!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Having trouble sleeping, my lady?{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Having trouble sleeping, my lady?{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Not tired, I guess.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Not tired, I guess.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I imagine not. Only a madman could sleep{LF}in a world such as this.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I imagine not. Only a madman could sleep{LF}in a world such as this.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Still, please try to sleep. You need your rest.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Still, please try to sleep. You need your rest.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: What are you, my mother?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What are you, my mother?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No. I am your disciple.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: No. I am your disciple.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I swore to serve you for eternity.{LF}I swore to give my life in your name if needs be.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I swore to serve you for eternity.{LF}I swore to give my life in your name if needs be.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: All right, all right. If I need something, I'll let you know.{#Name="Zero"}
source: All right, all right. If I need something, I'll let you know.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I eagerly await your orders.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I eagerly await your orders.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: I suppose Lady Three was never in the forest after all.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I suppose Lady Three was never in the forest after all.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Ho ho! The Land of Sands, then?{LF}Or perhaps the Cathedral City?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ho ho! The Land of Sands, then?{LF}Or perhaps the Cathedral City?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Better tackle them both.{LF}One and Three have to be hiding somewhere.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Better tackle them both.{LF}One and Three have to be hiding somewhere.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You fly up and search from above.{LF}The three of us'll check the underground ruins.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You fly up and search from above.{LF}The three of us'll check the underground ruins.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Okay!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Okay!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Very well, my lady.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Very well, my lady.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Understood.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Understood.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: ......{#Name="Zero"}
source: ......{#Name="Zero"}

translation: My lady?{#Name="Octa"}
source: My lady?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: This feels...off, somehow.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This feels...off, somehow.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Perhaps because Dito isn't here to complain about the plan...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Perhaps because Dito isn't here to complain about the plan...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: And Cent's not making up facts that couldn't possibly be true.{#Name="Octa"}
source: And Cent's not making up facts that couldn't possibly be true.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Yeah, I suppose you're right.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, I suppose you're right.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hmm...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmm...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho! So it seems disciples were always meant{LF}to be paired with certain Intoners...?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! So it seems disciples were always meant{LF}to be paired with certain Intoners...?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Yep.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yep.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, this explains a lot.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Well, this explains a lot.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: So Dito and Cent reverted to their original forms{#Name="Octa"}
source: So Dito and Cent reverted to their original forms{#Name="Octa"}

translation: as payment for summoning angels without their Intoners' power...{#Name="Octa"}
source: as payment for summoning angels without their Intoners' power...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: It takes a lot of energy to summon an angel.{LF}Without the power of a song,{#Name="Zero"}
source: It takes a lot of energy to summon an angel.{LF}Without the power of a song,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: there was no way for them to keep their human forms.{#Name="Zero"}
source: there was no way for them to keep their human forms.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ho ho ho... Well, this certainly mucks up the works, now, doesn't it?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ho ho ho... Well, this certainly mucks up the works, now, doesn't it?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: And on top of that, it looks like Mikhail{LF}is having trouble restraining his appetite.{#Name="Octa"}
source: And on top of that, it looks like Mikhail{LF}is having trouble restraining his appetite.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: You could say that.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You could say that.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What did that Accord girl say again?{#Name="Octa"}
source: What did that Accord girl say again?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: It's a dragon's instinct to consume the flower?{#Name="Octa"}
source: It's a dragon's instinct to consume the flower?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I don't think he can hold something like that in check so easily...{#Name="Octa"}
source: I don't think he can hold something like that in check so easily...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Hmmm...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Hmmm...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: When the time comes, I'll feed him.{#Name="Zero"}
source: When the time comes, I'll feed him.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: He can have me.{#Name="Zero"}
source: He can have me.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: By the way, Octa...{#Name="Zero"}
source: By the way, Octa...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yes?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Yes?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Isn't it about time you had a bath?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Isn't it about time you had a bath?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But I thought you enjoyed my musky odor!{#Name="Octa"}
source: But I thought you enjoyed my musky odor!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Besides, the sweet tang of man-funk really gets me in the mood...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Besides, the sweet tang of man-funk really gets me in the mood...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Wash up or get out.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Wash up or get out.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Goodness, this is quite the dilemma indeed...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Goodness, this is quite the dilemma indeed...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: ...Really?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Really?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If neither of those are available, plants will do. Trees are all right,{LF}too—in fact, I've been really enjoying mangoes lately!{#Name="Octa"}
source: If neither of those are available, plants will do. Trees are all right,{LF}too—in fact, I've been really enjoying mangoes lately!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: You know, what I'd really like to try sometime? A durian!{#Name="Octa"}
source: You know, what I'd really like to try sometime? A durian!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: こんなクソみたいな砂漠で迷うとは……{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: こんなクソみたいな砂漠で迷うとは……{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: We are Recorders.{#Name="Accord"}
source: We are Recorders.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Our duty is to observe.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Our duty is to observe.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: But as I continued to record the singularity known as Zero,{#Name="Accord"}
source: But as I continued to record the singularity known as Zero,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: I began to find myself filled with very strange emotions...{#Name="Accord"}
source: I began to find myself filled with very strange emotions...{#Name="Accord"}
